dct_alternative_sm: Descriptionis Ptolemaicæ avgmentvm siue Occidentis notitia breui commentario illustrata, et hac secunda editione magna sui parte aucta
dct_description_sm: First 2 and last 2 pages blank (included in page description).
Engraved title page and head and tail-pieces throughout.
Index listing maps according to abridged titles (e.g.: "Chili" for "Chili Provincia Amplissima"), with added fol. page numbers, in ink.
Additional numbers in ink in upper right corner on pages 93-191, referring to folio index.
dct_rights_sm: Images from the The Renaissance Exploration Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
